issue.title: Intensities of laser scan is too big

content.raw: As a stop-gap measure, you could use the lightweight [vigir_lidar_intensity_modifier](https://github.com/team-vigir/vigir_lidar_proc/tree/master/vigir_lidar_intensity_modifier) node that takes in a LIDAR scan, sets the intensity to a value as specified in by the `desired_intensity` parameter and republishes the scan. We use that in our [atlas gazebo setup like this](https://github.com/team-vigir/vigir_gazebo/blob/master/vigir_atlas_gazebo_launch/launch/atlas_no_controllers.launch).
